page.title: 12Fund Raising
page.content:
Rothersthorpe
On Spring Bank Holiday Monday Rothersthorpe village has a fund raising day to help certain charities. This Fund Raising is called Smuggler's Run and was started about four years ago. Two people from the village Mr Tucker and Mr Dickins help organise this run. The competion last all day and it is open to anyone who wishes to compete. People have to compete in teams and usually besides local teams there are teams from the Police, Army etc. Smuggler's Run is an obstacle course over fields, Canals, through barns, over rivers, sometimes using rafts and sometimes climbing ropes. All teams are timed and it is the fastest time for completing the course.
